biography_text: GOODEN, Lance, a Representative from Texas; born in Terrell, Kaufman County, Tex., December 1, 1982; graduated from Terrell High School, Terrell, Tex., 2001; B.A., University of Texas, Austin, Tex., 2004; B.B.A., University of Texas, Austin, Tex., 2004; insurance consultant; member of the Texas state house of representatives, 2011-2015, 2017-2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
